thread.title: Real Time Economics: Oil Hits New Highs | Economy’s Goldilocks Moment | Is Anyone Still Looking for a Job?

author: blogs.wsj.com
title: Real Time Economics: Oil Hits New Highs | Economy’s Goldilocks Moment | Is Anyone Still Looking for a Job?
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. Good morning! Today we look at rising oil prices, low unemployment and inflation, a kind of Nafta minimum wage, robots milking cows, trouble in emerging markets, and the declining number of Americans who aren’t in the labor force The April Jobs Report in 12 Charts
